summary.Title: Warehouse Coordinator
summary.Presentation: Do you have experience in warehouse operations and a passion for optimizing workflows while driving digitalization? Do you want to play a key role in ensuring efficient handling of our warehouse

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have experience in warehouse operations and a passion for optimizing workflows while driving digitalization? Do you want to play a key role in ensuring efficient handling of our warehouse and implementing innovative solutions? If so, we are looking for you to join our team!

Your position 

As a Warehouse Coordinator in our Technology Solutions division, you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our warehouse operates efficiently and smoothly. You will be responsible for managing project-related equipment, packing items for shipping, and contributing to the implementation of a digital warehouse management system.

At Semco Maritime, safety is a core value, and you will help maintain and promote a strong safety culture while supporting our journey toward digitalizing the warehouse.

Your workplace will be at our warehouse in Esbjerg, and the position is full-time.

“Here, you have a fantastic opportunity to work in a fast-growing industry with excellent development opportunities and passionate colleagues who constantly strive to be the best in their field,” says Manager, Telecom Engineering, Technology Solutions, Simon A. Brinch.

Your tasks and responsibilities 

As our new Warehouse Coordinator, you will ensure the efficient operation of our warehouse and contribute to digitalizing our processes.

Your tasks will include, but are not limited to:

  • Managing project-related warehouse operations and ensuring proper handling of equipment and materials.
  • Driving the digitalization of warehouse processes, including implementing a warehouse management system.
  • Packing equipment for shipping with attention to accuracy and timely dispatch.
  • Collaborating with project teams to ensure optimal support and workflows.
  • Supporting and adhering to health, safety, and environmental standards in all activities.

Your profile and qualifications 

We are looking for a proactive and structured warehouse professional who thrives in a dynamic work environment. You are passionate about optimizing warehouse processes and contributing to the implementation of digital solutions.

To succeed in this position, we imagine that you have:

  • Relevant experience in warehouse management and operations.
  • A valid forklift certificate (required).
  • A structured and detail-oriented approach to your work.
  • Interest in and preferably experience with the digitalization of warehouse processes (an advantage). 
  • Fluency in Danish and/or English.

Welcome to Semco Maritime At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,500 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we are concerned with the journey. How to get there. By providing the answers needed to make change real. Because we believe that global energy ambitions can only be realized through hard work and clever pragmatic solutions. This is what we do. This is what we invite you to participate in.

Safety is at the core of everything we do, and we are committed to protecting our people, partners, and the planet as we work towards a sustainable energy future.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?

Change. With us.
